newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: CS recommends writing calls on Swiss franc bonds.
newsitem.headline: CS recommends writing calls on Swiss franc bonds.

text.p: CS Research forecasts Swiss franc bond prices to move sideways as the market takes a breather from sharp gains made over the last few weeks and suggests investors write covered calls to boost returns.

"Investors who wish to improve earnings on their existing bond holdings should write calls," CS said in its weekly bond letter. "We suggest choosing a strike that is slightly 'out of the money'. We recommend a life of three months."
